name: Collabio
desc: A full-stack project management tool designed for team collaboration, task tracking, and productivity management. Built with React, Node.js, MongoDB, and Express.js.

name: AI Chatbot
desc: An intelligent chatbot built using Natural Language Processing (NLP) and machine learning. Designed to answer queries, simulate conversation, and support various tasks. Developed using Python, Streamlit, and NLP libraries.

name: College Management System
desc: A complete college automation solution with student, faculty, and admin modules. Features include attendance, exam results, announcements, and internal messaging. Built using Java, MySQL, and JSP/Servlets.
